hero.subtitle: Revolutionizing Customs Clearance
hero.title: Faster cargo clearance, with full data protection
hero.description: Transform your documents into digital proofs that are quick to verify and impossible to leak. Reduce costs while keeping your business secrets safe.

features.title: Value Propositions
features.description: Advanced technology to empower trade businesses, ensuring swift customs approval, significant cost reductions, and full data security.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Accelerate cargo dispatch from weeks to hours/days by streamlining document verification through cryptographic proofs.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Zero-knowledge proofs verify compliance without exposing sensitive business data, maintaining competitive advantage.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Effortlessly upload and process customs documents with a few clicks

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Automation
aiPowered.description: Our AI validates documents before generating evidence, reducing errors and ensuring compliance.

auditability.title: Auditability
auditability.description: Cryptographic proof and immutable blockchain hash provide transparent, tamper-proof verification records.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: Streamline customs clearance with automated verification, reducing manual checks and administrative overhead.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our platform uses zero-knowledge proofs and blockchain to securely verify customs documents without exposing sensitive information.

documentUpload.title: Document Upload
documentUpload.description: Import/export companies upload customs documents to the zkCargoPass Enterprise Portal.

aiValidation.title: AI Validation
aiValidation.description: Our AI validates document format and content before processing, ensuring compliance with regulations.

zkpGeneration.title: Zero-Knowledge Proof Generation
zkpGeneration.description: The system generates cryptographic proofs that verify document validity without revealing sensitive data.

blockchainVerification.title: Blockchain Verification
blockchainVerification.description: Proof hashes are stored on blockchain for immutable verification and auditability.

customsClearance.title: Customs Clearance
customsClearance.description: Customs authorities verify proofs through the Verifier Portal, accelerating cargo release.

partnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
partnerships.description: We collaborate with leading organizations to ensure regulatory compliance and operational excellence across the global trade ecosystem.

federalRevenue.name: Federal Revenue of Brazil
federalRevenue.description: Brazil's federal tax authority that oversees customs operations, document verification, and cargo clearance processes, ensuring full regulatory compliance with international trade standards.

serpro.name: SERPRO
serpro.description: Brazil's leading public technology company that provides the PortalÚnico/Siscomex platform infrastructure for seamless document processing and verification workflows.

tradeAssociations.name: Foreign Trade Associations
tradeAssociations.description: Strategic partnerships with ABEC, Sindaportos, and other leading trade organizations that provide valuable industry insights and drive market adoption.

pricing.title: Pricing Models
pricing.description: Flexible pricing options designed for businesses of all sizes, from small importers to large logistics operators.

saasEnterprise.title: SaaS Enterprise
saasEnterprise.description: Annual subscription for enterprises with regular import/export operations.

payPerProof.title: Pay-Per-Proof
payPerProof.description: Pay only for what you use. Ideal for businesses with irregular import volumes.

payPerContainer.title: Pay-Per-Container
payPerContainer.description: Pricing based on container value ranges for optimized cost management.

footer.description: Secure document verification through zero-knowledge proofs and blockchain technology.

demo.title: Request a Demo
demo.subtitle: See zkCargoPass in action
demo.description: Get a personalized demonstration of how zkCargoPass can transform your customs clearance process.

placeholders.name: John Smith

success.title: Demo Request Submitted!
success.description: Thank you for your interest in zkCargoPass. We'll get back to you within 24 hours to schedule your personalized demo.
success.preparation: We'll prepare a customized demo based on your specific needs
success.scheduling: Our team will contact you to schedule a convenient time
success.demo: You'll receive a comprehensive walkthrough of zkCargoPass features

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.overviewSubtitle: Here's what's happening with your zkCargoPass account today.

help.gettingStartedDesc: Learn the basics of zkCargoPass and how to use our platform
help.documentationDesc: Detailed technical documentation and API references
help.faqDesc: Frequently asked questions about our services

tooltips.overview: View your dashboard overview with key statistics, recent activity, and quick access to main platform features.
tooltips.documents: Upload and manage your cargo documents securely. These documents can be used for generating zero-knowledge proofs to verify ownership and authenticity.
tooltips.proofs: View and manage your generated zero-knowledge proofs. Track the history of all proofs created for your cargo documents and their verification status.
tooltips.generate: Generate zero-knowledge proofs for your cargo documents. Create proofs of ownership, document integrity, or timeline verification without revealing sensitive information.
tooltips.validate: Validate zero-knowledge proofs received from other parties. Verify the authenticity and ownership of cargo documents without accessing the original data.
tooltips.help: Access support resources, documentation, and contact information. Get help with using zkCargoPass features and troubleshooting any issues.
tooltips.settings: Manage your account preferences, security settings, and notification preferences for zkCargoPass.
tooltips.budget: View and manage your credit consumption for proof generation and validation operations.
tooltips.signOut: Securely log out of your zkCargoPass account.

aboutUs.title: About zkCargoPass
aboutUs.subtitle: Revolutionizing cargo and logistics through zero-knowledge proof technology, creating a more secure, transparent, and efficient supply chain ecosystem.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At zkCargoPass, we believe that the future of logistics lies in privacy-preserving technology that maintains transparency without compromising sensitive business data.
mission.description2: Our mission is to empower businesses with cutting-edge zero-knowledge proof solutions that streamline cargo operations while ensuring data privacy and regulatory compliance.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We're a diverse team of blockchain experts, logistics professionals, and privacy advocates working together to transform the cargo industry.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Experts
blockchain.description: Deep expertise in zero-knowledge proofs and cryptographic protocols

logistics.title: Logistics Professionals
logistics.description: Years of experience in supply chain management and cargo operations

privacy.title: Privacy Advocates
privacy.description: Committed to building solutions that protect user privacy and data rights

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Protecting sensitive data while maintaining transparency

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously pushing the boundaries of what's possible

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Building reliable solutions our partners can depend on

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Delivering high-quality solutions that exceed expectations

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Logistics?
cta.subtitle: Join the future of cargo management with zkCargoPass
